hba1c.impact: Strong indicator of long-term blood sugar control and metabolic health

fasting_glucose.impact: Key marker of current metabolic health and insulin sensitivity

crp.impact: Marker of systemic inflammation and cardiovascular health

papers.title: Biomarkers of Aging and Disease
key_findings: HbA1c is strongly correlated with biological age
Inflammatory markers like CRP can indicate accelerated aging
Metabolic health markers are key predictors of longevity
